application.name: Hypervisor - CIM OMC discrete sensor subsystem
Hypervisor - CIM OMC power supply subsystem
Hypervisor - CIM OMC Raw IPMI sensor subsystem
Hypervisor - CIM VMware SAS/SATA port subsystem
Hypervisor - CIM VMware storage extent subsystem
Hypervisor - CIM VMware storage volume subsystem

item.name: Number of processor cores on VMware hypervisor
item.description: Number of physical CPU cores on the host. Physical CPU cores are the processors contained by a CPU package.

item.name: Number of processor threads on VMware hypervisor
item.description: Number of physical CPU threads on the host.

item.name: Number of virtual machines on VMware hypervisor
VMware hypervisor ballooned memory size
item.description: The amount of guest physical memory that is currently reclaimed through the balloon driver. Sum of all guest VMs.

item.name: VMware hypervisor cluster name
item.description: Cluster name of the guest VM.

item.name: VMware hypervisor name
item.description: The complete product name, including the version information.

item.name: VMware hypervisor network number of bytes received per second
VMware hypervisor network number of bytes transmitted per second
VMware hypervisor processor frequency
item.description: The speed of the CPU cores. This is an average value if there are multiple speeds. The product of CPU frequency and number of cores is approximately equal to the sum of the MHz for all the individual cores on the host.

item.name: VMware hypervisor processor usage in Hz
item.description: Aggregated CPU usage across all cores on the host in Hz. This is only available if the host is connected.

item.name: VMware hypervisor status
item.description: The overall alarm status of the host: gray - unknown, ok, red - it has a problem, yellow - it might have a problem.

item.name: VMware hypervisor used memory size
item.description: Physical memory usage on the host.

item.name: VMware service full name
item.description: The complete product name, including the version information.
